om.graph
Class GraphScalar

java.lang.Object
  om.graph.GraphScalar

public class GraphScalar
extends java.lang.Object

Scalar value used in graph drawing that contains two components: the position in world co-ordinates, and an offset in pixel co-ordinates.

          One point
